articles.author: Joseph Zucker
articles.title: Daniel Jones Reportedly Has Leg Fracture, What's Colts QB's Injury Status vs. Texans? - Bleacher Report
articles.description: Indianapolis Colts quarterback Daniel Jones has a fracture in his fibula, according to NFL Network's Ian Rapoport.
articles.content:
Indianapolis Colts quarterback Daniel Jones has a fracture in his fibula, according to NFL Network's 
Ian Rapoport.
Jones continues to practice, with a source telling Rapoport he "looked good." The… [+1452 chars]
